descriptionHtml:
What's going on guys? This is my fifth mod, which improves the Nord Hero Bow.

It increases the speed to 1.45 (from 0.875) and increases the damage to 33 (from 11).

The improved bow's name is Skyforge Bow. It can be bought at the Windhelm Blacksmith.

This mod should be compatible with all mods.

Also on the Steam Workshop at http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=255304637

I would really appreciate suggestions, critiques, etc. Also if it doesnâ€™t work with a mod, please let me know.

If you enjoy this mod, please, leave a like. It helps get this mod noticed.

Thumbnail and screenshots taken and edited by me.
author: hmjki
